params._allocPoint: allocation points assigned to this new pool
params._lpToken: the lp token added to the pool

params._pid: The pool identifier where user deposit LP tokens
The pool identifier where user withdraws

params._resourcePerBlock: Number of tokens to reward per block

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._pid: Identifier of the pool in which we consult the pending rewards

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._pid: The pool identifier where user withdraw LP tokens

add(uint256,address).notice: Add a new LP token to the pool.

deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit LP tokens to the contract to receive rewards

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY.

getMultiplier(uint256,uint256).notice: Return reward multiplier over the given _from to _to block

initialize(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Initialize function for the proxy contract

massUpdatePools().notice: Update reward variables for all pools

poolLength().notice: Gets the length for the pool info array

set(uint256,uint256).notice: Update alloc points for the given pool

withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw LP tokens from the contract
